name: Turn of the Pirates
description:
Made for the third BlackThornProd Game Jam under the theme of "Less is More"

This game fits that theme by giving you the ability to either have your crew join you in battle, or have them buff your other crewmembers. The fewer you have in battle (less), the stronger your fighters will be (more).

----- Important Info -----

We didn't manage to implement SFX, so while the slider is there, it does not affect anything. Same with the "Reset Progress", as planned achievements didn't manage to be implemented

----- Controls -----

Left Click - Select

Right Click - Cancel

P - Pause
